Project.Brief history of your project and organi: NOAA Climate.gov provides timely and authoritative information about climate.  We promote public understanding of climate science and climate-related events through videos, stories, images, and data visualizations; we make common data products and services easy to access and use; and we provide tools and resources that help people make informed decisions about climate risks, vulnerability, and resilience.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: NOAA has generated a multi-decadal reanalysis and reforecast data set to accompany the next-generation version of its ensemble prediction system, the Global Ensemble Forecast System, version 12 (GEFSv12).
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We have some servers in HongKong for it. Lotus is the technology we use on servers for data preparing. Lotus can make data into car files. After we find sps, we transfer these data to them online/ offline.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Europe
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives, Lotus built-in data transfer
